mapper.sql: id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, type, code, status, resource_id
mapper.select:
select up.id, up.type, up.code from upms_permission up inner join upms_permission_role_rel uprr on up.id = uprr.permission_id where uprr.role_id in
#{item}

select up.id as id, up.code as permission_code, route_id, name, upe.type from upms_permission up inner join upms_page_element upe on upe.id = up.resource_id where up.is_deleted = 0 and upe.is_deleted = 0 and up.type = 'PAGE_ELEMENT' and upe.route_id = #{routeId} and up.is_deleted = 0 and upe.is_deleted = 0
select up.id, code from upms_permission up inner join upms_permission_role_rel uprr on uprr.permission_id = up.id where role_id = #{roleId} and up.type = #{type} and up.is_deleted = 0

select up.id permissionId, up.code permissionCode, up.type permissionType, ua.id apiId, ua.name apiName, ua.url apiUrl, ua.method apiMethod from upms_permission up inner join upms_api ua on ua.id = up.resource_id where ua.is_deleted = 0 and up.status = 1 and up.id in
#{item}
